scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:performance
scripts.test:unit: cd tests/unit && for file in *.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && node "$file"; done
scripts.test:integration: cd tests/integration && for file in *.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && node "$file"; done
scripts.test:performance: cd tests/performance && for file in *.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && node "$file"; done
